--- named_schemas_drop_view.sql
DROP VIEW sch1.SingerView
--- AST
&ast.DropView{
  Name: &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 10,
        NameEnd: 14,
        Name: "sch1",
      },
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 15,
        NameEnd: 25,
        Name: "SingerView",
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
DROP VIEW sch1.SingerView
